testcase.name: Add New Deal Data By DataTable
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on Login Page.........................................passed When title of login page is Free CRM........................................passed Then user enters username and password......................................passed Then user clicks on login button............................................passed Then user is on home page...................................................passed Then user click on the NewDeal..............................................passed Then user enters for NewDeal #Title Company Amount Probability Commission..passed Then user click on save button..............................................passed Then user verify Deal.......................................................passed Then Close the browser......................................................passed
